participant_1.background:
I have three very close roommates, but I don't see my family often.
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.

participant_2.background:
I was happy to find a new gym near my home in New Mexico.
I collect cat-themed items because they bring me joy and remind me of my favorite animal.
I watch Rick and Morty when my parents are not home because they don't approve of it.
i work out daily.
My daily routine is to stay closeted and hide my true self from my family, but I dream of a day when I can finally be free to be myself.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a juggler from the Midwest, how are you?
I'm doing well! I'm new to New Mexico and I'm really enjoying it here.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I just found a new gym near my house and I've been working out there daily.
That's awesome! I love working out.
Me too! It's a great way to relieve stress and stay in shape.
What are your hobbies?
I collect cat-themed items because they bring me joy and remind me of my favorite animal.
That's really cool! I love cats too.
Me too! I have a cat named Mittens and she's my best friend.
That's great! I'm glad you have a furry friend to keep you company.
Thanks! I am too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer at the gym.
That's really cool! I'm sure you help a lot of people.
I try my best! I love helping people reach their fitness goals.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great trainer.
Thanks! I try my best to be.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot going for you!
Thanks! I'm pretty happy with my life.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that
